casebody.data:
No. D-2510. In the Matter of Discipline of Thomas J. Spargo. 562 U.S. 810, 131 S. Ct. 399,

178 L. Ed. 2d 265,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 7619. October 4, 2010.

Thomas J. Spargo, of East Berne, New York, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
